abstract: Venezuelan opposition party has its best chance in years to win majority in upcoming legislative elections due to stalling economy, triple-digit inflation, shortages of basic goods and deep recession.
lead_paragraph: The mood in neighborhoods that were once strongholds of Hugo Chávez now seems receptive to opposition candidates in Venezuela.

headline.main: Venezuela’s Economic Woes Buoy Opposition Before Election
headline.print_headline: Venezuela’s Economic Pain Gives Opposition Lift Before Vote

snippet: The mood in neighborhoods that were once strongholds of Hugo Chávez now seems receptive to opposition candidates in Venezuela.
